product_name: The North Face Buckland Pants - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: Made with heavyweight-but-soft cotton canvas, reinforced seams and extra rivets at the pocket corners, The North Face Buckland pants with 32 in. inseam are designed for years of use and abuse. Gusseted inseam allows great freedom of movement. Reinforcement at the back hems improves the durability of high-wear areas. The North Face Buckland pants include two hand pockets and two rear patch pockets.
short_description: Made with heavyweight-but-soft cotton canvas, reinforced seams and extra rivets at the pocket corners, The North Face Buckland pants with 32 in. inseam are designed for years of use and abuse.
